Author: adsigma
Title: ðŸš€ðŸ’¥[ANN][Pre-sale is LIVE] AdSigma - Digital Advertising Revolution
Body: In an effort to help advertisers and publishers in the digital marketing space to boost their users and brand engagement, along with disrupting the digital duopoly of giant advertisement networks - Google and Facebook, AdSigma, a next-generation Digital Display Advertising Platform, is planning to bring about a change in the space via blockchain revolution. To start with, the Singapore-based startup is debuting their own cryptocurrency called ADSi token that is to become the major payment method for transactions on the digital platform.

Author: Wapinter
Title: ðŸš€ðŸ’¥[ANN][Pre-sale is LIVE] AdSigma - Digital Advertising Revolution
Body: AdSigma.io  Web | Whitepaper | Twitter | Facebook | Reddit | Github | Telegram Whitepaper | Official Website  The Pre-Sale is from 5th April 2018 to 20th April 2018 Crowdsale from 20th April 2018 to 20th May 2018   Join Our Bounty Program | Join our Signature Program   Our pre-sale isLIVE NOW  We are delighted to present you - AdSigma  AdSigma brings you a platform for buying and selling Digital Display Advertising space. Built on the blockchain technology, it addresses the higher commission charged by the Advertising Networks, Irrelevant advertisements, lower conversions and various other problems associated with current scenario. We are thrilled to announce the launch of ADSi, AdSigmaâ€™s utility token, which is scheduled for its Pre-Sale from 5th April 2018 to 20th April 2018 and Crowdsale from 20th April 2018 to 20th May 2018. You donâ€™t want to miss this opportunity!   AdSigma is powered by the ADSi tokens  ADSi will be used by the publishers and advertisers on the AdSigmaâ€™s platform to buy and sell ad space. ADSi can be maintained in an ERC20 compliant Ethereum wallet.     ADSi will be traded at 1 ETH = 3750 ADSi during the Pre-Sale. ADSi will be traded at 1 ETH = 3000 ADSi during the Crowdsale.  ADSi Crowdsale (ICO) Details Name of Token: ADSi Symbol: ADSi Standard: ERC20 Standard   Decimals: 18   Role of Token: Utility Token. Use of Token: Purchasing goods and services on the AdSigma platform   Total supply: 100,000,000 ADSi Available token for sale: 65,000,000 (65% of supply)   Emission: All unsold and unallocated tokens will be destroyed, and additional release of tokens will not be possible   Period of Pre-Sale: 5th April 2018 UTC 10:00 to 20th April 2018 UTC 10:00 Period of Sale: 20th April 2018 UTC 10:00 to 20th May 2018 UTC 10:00 Cost of 1 ADSi: 1/3750th ETH (Pre Sale), 1/3000th ETH (Crowdsale) Softcap/Minimum Goal: 2,850 ETH Hardcap/Maximum Goal: 19,000 ETH Accepted currencies: Ethereum Smart Contract Address: 0xcdd1a0fdbad9dc6c0f4dbfec9977a1a98087f33a      Bounty Program  Check out our bounty thread below: Join Our Bounty Program   AdSigma VISION AND MISSION  THE PROBLEM The existing model of Digital display advertising is becoming more and more unfavorable to the publishers and advertisers, mainly due to the presence of advertising networks. Advertising networks have revenue of over $220 Billion annually, which they earn as a commission from online advertising fee, and accounts for over 40% of total online advertising spending. Due to the unjustifiable higher commission rates, the absence of flexibility in price quotation, lack of ability of negotiation between the publisher and the advertiser, delay in receipts due to the minimum withdrawal limit clause and various other reasons, there is a need for an alternative platform.  THE SOLUTION We, at AdSigma, aim to restructure the existing arrangement in business model by removing the need for the middleman that exists in the form of ad networks, and help the publishers and advertisers to get the best out of online advertisements. AdSigma is building a decentralized network using the blockchain technology to overcome all the problems of traditional online advertising structure and to benefit the advertisers and publishers.  Meet the Team     Our Advisors    Join our conversations on: Twitter: https://twitter.com/adsigmacoin Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/adsigmacoin Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/AdSigma/ Github: https://github.com/adsigma Telegram: https://t.me/adsigma  Live Help 24/7 on our Telegram: https://t.me/adsigma
